article.description: Blake Francis matched his career high with 29 points as Richmond beat Hampton 80-63 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Francis scores 29 to carry Richmond over Hampton 80-63
article.linkText: Francis scores 29 to carry Richmond over Hampton 80-63
article.story: HAMPTON, Va. -- Blake Francis matched his career high with 29 points as Richmond beat Hampton 80-63 on Tuesday night. Francis shot 6 for 9 from behind the arc and added six assists. Jacob Gilyard had 18 points and 10 assists for Richmond (7-1). Nick Sherod added 16 points and nine rebounds. Ben Stanley tied a career high with 24 points and had 13 rebounds for the Pirates (3-5), whose losing streak stretched to four games. Edward Oliver-Hampton added 12 points and Davion Warren had 10. Richmond plays South Alabama at home on Sunday. Hampton takes on Howard at home on Thursday. --- For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP-Top25 --- This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
